insert into result_day (project_id, code, rec_time, data_value, state, remarks,sys_time) values ( #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now())

mapper.select: select id, project_id, code, rec_time, data_value, state, remarks from result_day
